test_cases.description: Nominal Case: All conditions true (AMAN=OPERATIONAL, phase=ARRIVAL, valid TTT, delay>AMAN_MIN_DELAY_THRESHOLD, runway assigned, AMAN enabled, separation OK) → alert should NOT be generated
Condition C1 NOT satisfied: AMAN status != OPERATIONAL (other conditions true) → alert SHOULD be generated
C1 State transition: AMAN status changes from non-OPERATIONAL to OPERATIONAL → alert SHOULD be not generated after transition
C1 State transition: AMAN status changes from OPERATIONAL to non-OPERATIONAL → alert SHOULD be generated after transition
Condition C2 NOT satisfied: Track in phase != ARRIVAL, other conditions true → alert SHOULD be generated
Condition C2 NOT satisfied: Track in phase ARRIVAL but time-to-threshold INVALID, other conditions true → alert SHOULD be generated
C2 State transition: Track changes from phase non-ARRIVAL to ARRIVAL with valid TTT → alert should NOT be generated after transition
C2 State transition: Time-to-threshold becomes INVALID during ARRIVAL phase → alert SHOULD be generated
Condition C3 NOT satisfied: Track OUTSIDE E-TMA boundary limits, other conditions true → alert SHOULD be generated
C3 State transition: Track ENTERS E-TMA limits → alert should NOT be generated after entry
C3 State transition: Track LEAVES E-TMA limits → alert should be generated after entry
Condition C4 BOUNDARY: Calculated arrival delay = EXACTLY AMAN_MIN_DELAY_THRESHOLD, other conditions true → behavior per spec (typically alert generated because condition is > not >=)
Condition C4 NOT satisfied: Calculated arrival delay < AMAN_MIN_DELAY_THRESHOLD, other conditions true → alert SHOULD be generated
Condition C4 satisfied: Calculated arrival delay > AMAN_MIN_DELAY_THRESHOLD, other conditions true → alert should NOT be generated
C4 State transition: Arrival delay changes from < AMAN_MIN_DELAY_THRESHOLD to > AMAN_MIN_DELAY_THRESHOLD → alert should NOT be generated after delay increase
C4 State transition: Arrival delay changes from > AMAN_MIN_DELAY_THRESHOLD to < AMAN_MIN_DELAY_THRESHOLD → alert SHOULD be generated after delay decrease
Condition C5 NOT satisfied: Track HAS NO assigned arrival runway (runway not specified), other conditions true → alert SHOULD be generated
Condition C5 NOT satisfied: Track has assigned runway BUT AMAN sequencing is DISABLED on that runway, other conditions true → alert SHOULD be generated
Condition C5 satisfied: Track has assigned runway AND AMAN sequencing ENABLED → alert should NOT be generated
Condition C6 NOT satisfied: Sequence position change would VIOLATE minimum separation TBS_MIN_SEPARATION_TIME, other conditions true → alert SHOULD be generated
Condition C6 satisfied: Sequence position change RESPECTS minimum separation (> TBS_MIN_SEPARATION_TIME between aircraft), other conditions true → alert should NOT be generated
Condition C6 BOUNDARY: Position change with separation = EXACTLY TBS_MIN_SEPARATION_TIME, other conditions true → behavior per spec
